Reviews.Content: Excellent We (both 60+, Dutch couple) spent a week in this guesthouse. We had a fine room, a very good bed and every day coffee or tea with a watercooker. Further on a good airconditioning, no mosquito's or flies. Clean shared badroom/douche. Great welcome by the father of the boss. Highly recommended. Very quiet at the backside. Good transportfacilities (bus), nearby Central Station.
Reviews.Author: anonymous047

Reviews.Content: Me parece un buen hotel para su...   showReview(16730136, 'full');
